answer:
QUESTION
I am software engg I got a project which is to put the films of international film festival on internet? The earnings from this is permissilbe or it is Haram ? Jazakallah Khair
ANSWER


Share:
Allah Ta?ala says, ?And do not assist in sin?? (Maaidah)

The festivals of Kuffaar have many un-Islamic in them. To film and place such festivals on the internet will be assisting in spreading the evils of such festivals, therefore, not permissible.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
